channel.title: Welcome to Opensource SSP Server Project on Opensource SSP Server
channel.description: Recent content in Welcome to Opensource SSP Server Project on Opensource SSP Server

item.title: Quick start
item.description:
SSP server is a simple, yet powerful server that can be used to host your static websites. This guide will help you get started with SSP server.

Installation
#

To install SSP server, download the latest release from the github releases page. Extract the downloaded archive and run the sspserver binary.

item.title: Installation
item.description: IN PROGRESS: This documentation is a work in progress. We are continuously updating it with new information and features. If you have any suggestions or feedback, please let us know!
